alert.note: Alert for Darke; Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 2:27PM EST until February 27 at 2:45PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EST FOR NORTHERN PREBLE AND SOUTHEASTERN DARKE COUNTIES... At 226 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Madison, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Arcanum, Lewisburg, New Madison, Eldorado, Verona, West Manchester, Pitsburg, Gordon, Ithaca and Castine. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 3 and 8. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
